SEARCH
Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.type

Class RangeParameter<T extends Number & Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<T>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.RangeParameter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The numeric and comparable type of the parameter (e.g., Integer, Double)
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleParameter, IntegerParameter
public abstract class RangeParameter<T extends Number & Comparable<T>> extends Parameter<T>
A generic parameter class for numeric values constrained within an inclusive range [lowerBound, upperBound]. This abstract class provides built-in validation logic and requires subclasses to implement type-specific string parsing.

This class is intended to be extended by concrete implementations such as IntegerParameter and DoubleParameter, enabling reusable logic for bounded numerical parameters in configurable systems.

Author:
Antonio J. Nebro

    • RangeParameter

      protected RangeParameter(String name, T lowerBound, T upperBound)
      Constructs a RangeParameter with the specified name and bounds.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the parameter
      lowerBound - the inclusive lower bound
      upperBound - the inclusive upper bound
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if lowerBound or upperBound is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if lowerBound >= upperBound
